Subject: Keyword detection in subject and body of webmail.
Description:
Hello.

How could we configure the platform to detect a keyword defined in a policy both in the subject and in the body of a message created in the ‘Arsys’ webmail platform?

Regards
What_We_Know__c:
08.05
The customer wants to be able to block custom content from the subject & body of the Arsys webmail service.
We do not support this in EPP, and asked the customer if they want to raise a feature request for this.
Next_Steps__c:
08.05
Wait for the customer to confirm if they need a feature request for this.
Solution_Comment__c: Currently, the EPP does not support detection in the email subject and body for the Arsys webmail. The customer submitted an idea on the Netwrix Idea Portal.
Account_Name__c: GESTION DE ACTIVIDADES Y SERVICIOS EMPRESARIALES S.L
